entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 6:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and wet flurries changing to flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the morning then clearing. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023
